author: Brodie Robertson
description:
You may recall back in the late 2010's a Wayland compositor by the name of Waycooler, a re imagining of the AwesomeWM window manager on top of Wayland, and here's the story of why it just never amounted to anything.

title: Wayland Desktop 5 Years Too Early To Be Awesome
